Description: The Medivac is a versatile Terran support vessel that combines the roles of dropship and mobile medic. It provides crucial healing to biological infantry and enables rapid troop deployment across the battlefield. With its Afterburners ability for emergency speed boosts, the Medivac is essential for sustaining bio armies and executing multi-pronged harassment.

Ability.Name: Heal
Ability.Description: Automatically heals nearby biological units at 12.6 health per second. Prioritizes damaged units and those in combat.

Ability.Name: Ignite Afterburners
Ability.Description: Increases movement speed from 3.5 to 5.95 for 4 seconds. Essential for escaping danger or rapid positioning.

Upgrade.Name: High Capacity Fuel Tanks
Upgrade.Effect: Increases Afterburners duration from 4 to 7 seconds

Competitive Usage.General: Medivacs are the cornerstone of Terran bio play, providing essential healing for Stimpacked armies and enabling powerful drop harassment. They allow Terran armies to sustain through extended engagements and recover quickly between fights. Proper Medivac management involves preserving energy for critical heals, using Afterburners to escape threats, and executing multi-prong attacks to overwhelm opponents.
Competitive Usage.Vs. Protoss: Crucial for healing bio armies against Protoss ground forces. Enables devastating drops against undefended bases and tech structures. Vulnerable to Phoenix graviton beam and Stalker focus fire. Afterburners help escape from Oracle and Phoenix pursuit. Often used in 2-Medivac timing attacks for early pressure.
Competitive Usage.Vs. Terran: Essential in bio vs bio mirrors for sustaining Marine-Marauder engagements. Enables tank drops for cliff positioning and base harassment. Vulnerable to Viking superiority and Cyclone lock-ons. High Capacity Fuel Tanks upgrade significantly enhances drop survivability and tactical mobility.
Competitive Usage.Vs. Zerg: Fundamental for bio compositions against Zerg, healing through Ling-Bane damage and Queen attacks. Enables Hellbat drops against drone lines and multi-prong harassment. Vulnerable to Mutalisk flocks and Spore Crawler defense. Proper energy management is critical for sustaining through Zerg's burst damage.
